Text: The percentage of online adults who use social networking sites has steadily risen. As of January 2015, 74% of all online adults use social networking sites. Social media technologies takes many different forms including microblogs, photosharing, business networks, blogs, social networks and messaging applications. To learn more about a specific social media, hover over a circle on the timeline above. If you want to see a more country specific view, select your desired country to the right.
